overview: Alex Cone has over 20 years’ experience designing and implementing large-scale, mission critical systems for leading Wall Street firms and has founded two successful technology companies, Objective Technologies in the early 1990s and CodeFab, in 1997. Alex is a recognized expert in web-based enterprise scale financial systems and iPhone development and has lectured at Apple and OpenBase developer conferences. Recently he concluded an engagement as the manager of the CMS group at the Apple On-line Store. Alex is the lead trainer and courseware author for the New York iPhone Boot Camp
